column1: Little Goat Diner////As the empty plates were cleared away
column2: time for my entree. I was feeling quite dead sexy at this time. You see
column3: my belly was reaching epic proportions;gas was flying. Although as much as I tried
column4: the food had won. I was so uncomfortably full. I could only thank god I was going to be wearing scrubs for the next 12 hours.
